entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Meitu-AI Photo Editor & Design
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Monthly Auto-renew Meitu SVIPï¼š$12.49 â†’ $3.99 [$3.99 ~ $12.49]

Application Description

Meitu is the simplest image processing tool that can quickly achieve professional-level photo editing effects. AI tools are constantly updated, and everyone can make good pictures! === AI image modification, intelligent design without effort === [AI Cutout] Efficient in all categories, 3s background removal, one-click change of background color/local pictures [AI Remover] One-click removal of redundant text, passers-by, skin acne spots, complex backgrounds, etc., without leaving any traces! [AI Enhancer] Ultra-clear image quality rebirth, say goodbye to poor image quality [AI Background Change] Enter keywords, AI generates product and portrait scene pictures [AI Expand] Freely expand the picture frame, intelligently fill the picture, and the composition does not need to be cropped! [AI Smart Selection] Any element can be freely moved, scaled, copied, redrawn, eliminated, and adjusted in color... ===Meitu Batch Editor, efficient and higher quality=== Import hundreds of pictures at a time, batch cut out pictures to change backgrounds, make them clear, add watermarks, crop and change sizes, compress and convert formats, etc., without repeated operations, efficient and refined! ===Poster design, change pictures and words with one click=== Massive high-quality templates cover e-commerce, administrative office, new media, WeChat and many other scenarios. ===Puzzle splicing, creative layout=== Seamless, horizontal and vertical, four-grid, nine-grid, love, triangle and many other puzzle styles, you can also freely assemble, social more colorful! ===Basic picture editing, simple and outstanding=== [Add text] [Crop, rotate, correct, and adjust size] [Dimming, color adjustment, and filter][Border stickers] [Brush] ===Medical-grade portrait beauty, high-definition natural face=== [One-click beauty and whitening] [Facial reshaping] [Face slimming, body slimming, height increase] [Eye and Teeth Refinement] â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€” [Meitu computer version SVIP automatic renewal service statement] [Meitu computer SVIP rights] Experience massive materials, personalized functions, and more refreshing without ads. [Subscription period] Meitu Computer SVIP - Continuous Monthly Subscription: Subscription period of 1 month Meitu PC SVIP - Continuous Season: Subscription period of 3 months Meitu PC SVIP - Consecutive Yearly Subscription: Subscription period of 12 months [Subscription price] The iAP application information shall prevail. For example, continuous monthly subscription products are 20 yuan per month; continuous seasonal subscription products are 50 yuan per quarter; continuous annual subscription products are 168 yuan per year. [Payment] After the user confirms the purchase and pays, it will be charged to the iTunes account. [Renewal] "Continuous monthly/quarterly/yearly" products are auto-renewable products, and your iTunes account will be charged after confirming the purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription. Within 24 hours before your subscription period expires, Apple will automatically deduct the fee from your iTunes account, and the membership validity period will be automatically extended by one period after success. [Cancel renewal] If you want to cancel the automatic renewal, please manually go to "Settings" on your iPhone - click "Apple ID", select to enter the "Subscription" page, and select "Meitu SVIP" to cancel the subscription. [Free Trial] Renew the subscription during the free trial period to cancel the renewal, and the free trial rights will not be recovered from the user, and the user can try it until the trial period ends. ==Related Agreement== Membership Service Agreement: https://pc.meitu.com/agreement Privacy Policy Address: https://pc.meitu.com/legal-agreement?type=pc

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: KitVPN â€“ Fast & World NetWork
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Monthlyï¼š$6.99 â†’ $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $6.99]

Application Description

[Fox VPN - Your Secure Gateway to Uninterrupted Connectivity] Fox VPN provides a seamless and secure network acceleration experience, empowering users to enjoy reliable internet access anytime, anywhere. Ideal for work, study, or entertainment, FoxVPN delivers efficient and stable connections with cutting-edge encryption and optimized performance. Our advanced infrastructure ensures lightning-fast speeds and minimal latency, supporting applications in gaming, video streaming, music, social media, business, and education. Connect confidently with just one click. [Key Features] High-Speed Network Optimization: FoxVPNâ€™s intelligent acceleration technology automatically selects optimal pathways, ensuring ultra-fast speeds and low latency for smooth streaming, gaming, and browsing. Military-Grade Security: Protect your online activity with advanced encryption, safeguarding your data from unauthorized access and cyber threats. Browse, work, and stream with peace of mind. Seamless Multi-Device Support: Compatible across PCs, smartphones, tablets, and more, FoxVPN lets you stay connected on all devices without compromising speed or security. Stable & Reliable Connections: Built on a robust global infrastructure, FoxVPN minimizes downtime and ensures consistent performance for uninterrupted productivity and entertainment. [Key Use Cases] Entertainment Scenario Kevin loves streaming movies and music but often faces buffering and connectivity issues. With FoxVPN, he enjoys ultra-fast speeds and stable connections, enabling smooth, high-quality streaming. Whether at home or on the go, FoxVPN keeps his entertainment experience seamless and buffer-free. Work Scenario Flora, a global marketing manager, relies on secure access to company resources while traveling. FoxVPNâ€™s encrypted connections ensure her sensitive data stays protected, even on public networks. The one-click acceleration feature guarantees reliable performance, letting her collaborate efficiently with international teams. Study Scenario Michael, a dedicated student, needs uninterrupted access to online learning platforms and academic tools. FoxVPNâ€™s high-speed connections and low latency allow him to attend virtual classes, download resources, and stream educational content without disruptions. [Technical Support] support@matefox.net [Terms of Service] Terms of Service: https://matefox.net/TermsofServiceEng.html Privacy Policy: https://matefox.net/PrivacyPolicyEng.html

entry.title: Paper - Live Wallpapers
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Upgrade to Plusï¼š$12.99 â†’ $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $12.99]

Application Description

ã€ŒPaper - Live Wallpapers & 4k HD Wallpaperã€ ã€ŠPaper - Live Wallpapersã€‹ is a 4K Live Wallpaper that makes stunning photos for your phone wallpaper every day. This is one of the best wallpaper apps ever on the iPhone. All wallpapers are carefully selected by our team to make every background look beautiful, including 4K (Ultra HD|Ultra HD) and 5K (Full HD) wallpapers|backgrounds. Rich live wallpapers give the iPhone desktop agility while occupying as little system resources as possible. If you are still looking for a wallpaper application under iPhone, don't hesitate, "Paper - Live Wallpapers" is what you want! characteristic: â— Provide 20,000+ exquisite wallpaper materials (iPad contains 10,000+ wallpapers), which are continuously updated, so you don't have to spend time looking for materials. â— Live wallpaper, only supports when the iPhone device is set as the lock screen, press to display the live wallpaper effect. For systems above iOS 16.0, the dynamic effect will not be displayed after setting the dynamic wallpaper. â— Charging animation â— Desktop themes â— Zero app learning cost, simple interaction, and the pursuit of the best experience. â— The interface of Paper wallpaper is exquisite, comfortable experience, supports dark mode, extremely beautiful. â— We strive to simplify the application to provide excellent performance. Save battery. â— Constantly increasing live wallpaper themes: new wallpapers are added every week. If you have a unique live video wallpaper and want to share it with everyone, please submit it to us. Support one-click preview, 20000+ exquisite wallpapers are waiting for you. Happy! Happy! Install "Paper - Live Wallpapers" now and make your device screen amazing and interesting! This is the normal version. Certain functions will be restricted. The iPad&iPhone version does not contain live wallpapers. If you have any problems with the app or wallpaper, please contact us at ninthgame.team@gmail.com, we are happy to help you solve the problem. Please enjoy! Regarding Paper's automatic renewal: -After the purchase is confirmed, the payment will be credited to the iTunes account immediately. â€“ Automatic renewal can be turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period, otherwise it will be automatically renewed. -Account will be deducted for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period. The fee depends on the selected plan. â€“ Users can manage subscriptions, and go to user account settings after purchase to turn off auto-renewal. â€“ Any unused part of the free trial period will be automatically invalidated when the user purchases the applicable subscription. The following three ways to purchase are now available to enjoy the right to use all wallpapers, updated daily, and no ads: â€¢ Subscription every 6 months â€“ $4.99 â€¢ Annual subscription with three-day free trial â€“ $8.49 â€¢ One-time buyout â€“ $12.99 Privacy Policy: https://artyli.github.io/privacy.html Terms of Use: https://artyli.github.io/terms.html If you need help, please contact us: ninthgame.team@gmail.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Live Wallpaper - 4K UHD
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Upgrade to Pro Versionï¼š$4.99 â†’ $2.99 [$2.99 ~ $4.99]

Application Description

Live Wallpaper offers over 4000+ 4K wallpapers. If you're searching for Wallpaper Engine for your Mac, this app is exactly what you need! More features: â— "Smart Control" â€“ Automatically pauses when using other apps, so your work is not interrupted. â— "Break Reminder" â€“ Customize reminder times to prompt users to take breaks. â— "Scheduled Switching" â€“ Automatically changes wallpapers every half hour, hour, or daily. â— Multi-monitor support â€“ Set different wallpapers for different displays. â— "Hide Desktop Icons" â€“ For an immersive experience. â— "Global Hotkeys" â€“ Switch wallpapers, hide desktop icons, or display screensaver with one key press. Live Wallpaper is designed to provide an interesting experience while consuming as little system resources as possible. "Works like a charm. Lets me play videos as my wallpaper and overall is easy to use. I would suggest to anyone looking for a wallpaper engine like software for mac." â€”â€” mono.mirrorz "This is a great alternative for Wallpaper Engine and is also incredibly easy to use. The wallpapers are beautiful and clear. The app is updated with different backgrounds often as well. I highly recommend if you have been looking for an app that offers beautiful, dynamic wallpapers! :)" â€”â€” HelloMyNameisNickel

entry.title: QuickFox-æµ·å¤–å›å›½åŠ é€Ÿå™¨è¿½å‰§å¬æ­Œæ¸¸æˆç•™å­¦ç”Ÿå¿…å¤‡
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Annual VIPï¼š$84.99 â†’ $39.99 [$39.99 ~ $84.99]

Application Description

QuickFox is a high-quality accelerator specially created for overseas Chinese and students. It is a accelerator for overseas Chinese to watch TV dramas, listen to songs, play games, live events, business offices, futures and stock trading, etc. It has now provided high-quality return acceleration services to millions of overseas Chinese students around the world. It is one-click direct connection, stable and easy to use, and is the first choice for overseas Chinese around the world to accelerate their links to China. Please note: This product is only available to overseas users. Users in mainland China cannot use this product service normally, please download with caution. ã€QuickFox main functionsã€‘ *Connect to the domestic network with one click, and visit domestic applications and web pages with low latency. *Reduced latency for Chinese server games: various popular Chinese server games such as Honor of Kings, Identity V, Peace Elite, Eggboy Party, DNF, Genshin Impact, Steam, etc. have stable connections and ultra-low latency. - Covering global dedicated servers, high-speed connection with low latency fluctuations, stable switching and continuous connection. - One account can be switched seamlessly, and multiple devices can be logged in at the same time, making it convenient and fast. [QuickFox technical advantages] *High-speed dedicated server. *Global nodes, stable acceleration. *High-level encryption, privacy guaranteed. [Continuous monthly membership] 1. Benefits: accelerated advertising-free, exclusive super VIP member servers, etc. 2. 1-month subscription. 3. Subscription price: Continuous monthly subscription for RMB 40 4. Payment: Credited to the iTunes account after payment 5. Cancel renewal: Manually turn off the automatic renewal function in iTunes/Apple ID settings within 24 hours before the current subscription period expires. 6. Renewal: Apple's iTunes account will be deducted within 24 hours before expiration. After the deduction is successful, the subscription period will be extended by one subscription period. 7. Privacy Policy: https://inside.quickfox.com.cn/agreement 8. Continuous monthly membership service agreement: https://inside.quickfox.com.cn/monthlyVipAgreement 9. VIP Service Agreement: https://inside.quickfox.com.cn/memberServiceAgreement 10. Terms of Service: https://inside.quickfox.com.cn/clause ============================ Email: info@quickfox.com.cn WeChat public account: QuickFox ============================

Application Screenshot

entry.title: Cleaner One Pro - Uninstaller
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Unlock Full Versionï¼š$29.99 â†’ $19.99 [$19.99 ~ $29.99]

Application Description

Cleaner One Pro is the all-in-one Mac Master Cleaner App. It can optimize your disk usage, free up space on your Mac, keep the hard drive clean, remove duplicate photos and other files, manage your apps, and much more. Fully compatible with macOS Monterey and Apple Silicon. PRIMARY FEATURES [Junk Files Cleaner] â€¢ Has Quick Disk Clean feature you can click from the Status Bar Menu â€¢ Clean temporary files, including logs, mail caches, iTunes and iOS temporary files, etc. Empty Trash for current user â€¢ Detect remaining files after deleting Apps â€¢ Clean Junk Files in removable storage on your Mac [Duplicate File Scanner] â€¢ Thorough and quick scan â€” fast and accurate scanning technique covers your entire home folder â€¢ Smart and Accurate Filter â€” duplicates are selected not only by file name but also by their content. Files are shown in detailed preview. Click the Auto Select button to help you decide which copy you wish to delete. â€¢ Easy and safe decision â€” duplicates can be sorted by file type and listed in their full route for you to track. You can decide which way to clean these files; either by sending them to Trash or deleting them permanently (In-App Purchase required) [Photo Manager] â€¢ Quickly find similar photos, blurry photos, and screenshots â€¢ Preview photos in groups after scanning â€¢ Organize your photo library â€¢ Easily remove photos that may be safe to delete to free up space (In-App Purchase required) [Intelligent App Manager] â€¢ Auto-clean leftovers of deleted Apps â€¢ Manage all installed applications with the All-in-One App Optimizer â€¢ Detect and remove leftover files of deleted apps with the App Manager â€¢ List all the applications installed on your Mac by name, size, and last opened date â€¢ Remove unwanted applications with Mac Disk Clean (In-App Purchase required) â€¢ Remove all the associated files of uninstalled applications (In-App Purchase required) â€¢ Added Vulnerability Scan in the App Manager to enhance security (In-App Purchase required) [Big Files Scanner] â€¢ 1-click scan of big files (customizable size from 10 MB and above) â€¢ Multiple filters of size, date, name and type â€¢ Local files in sync with your cloud drives can also be found * Important big files can be ""locked"" into the protected list to avoid accidental deletion [Mac Disk Clean Map] â€¢ Mac Disk Clean scans all your disk drives and creates a clickable map of the files on your disk, color-coded by type â€¢ Provides additional information about files when you click on an item on the map â€¢ View your entire disk by file or folder size to determine which files or folders use the most space with Clean Master [Real-Time System Status] â€¢ Real-time network usage â€¢ Real-time CPU usage â€¢ See detailed network and CPU information (In-App Purchase required) The paid version costs as little as $19.99 per year (this price may vary by location). Subscriptions will auto-renew unless canceled. â€” Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase â€” Subscription may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the userâ€™s Account Setting after purchase. â€” No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. â€” Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. â€” Your account will be charged for renewal for the amount of your current subscription within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. All cost for subscriptions are mentioned above. Privacy Policy and Terms of Use Privacy Policy: http://gr.trendmicro.com/GREntry/NonPayment?Target=TrendCleaner&OS=&SP=&PID=TCS60&FunID=PrivacyPolicy&VID=&Locale=en Terms of Use: http://gr.trendmicro.com/GREntry/NonPayment?Target=TrendCleaner&OS=&SP=&PID=TCS60&FunID=EULA&VID=&Locale=en Please comment in the App Store and you can also email us directly at mac_support@trendmicro.com.

Application Screenshot

iPhone
